rooms.description: Modern living area with open space and ample natural light.
Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances, designed for efficiency and minimalism. Located near the dining area for easy service.
Dining space integrated with the living area for a seamless flow of movement and interaction.
Two-car garage located adjacent to the main entrance, providing easy access and ample parking space.
Central courtyard with open air, designed for ventilation, natural light, and a private outdoor gathering space in compliance with Vastu principles.
Open corridor connecting all ground floor spaces to ensure smooth flow between rooms.

openings.description: Modern door with glass accents to allow natural light, designed according to Vastu guidelines for positive energy.
Large window offering a view of the central courtyard and ensuring proper ventilation in line with Vastu.
Window for kitchen illumination and exhaust venting, designed with energy efficiency in mind.
Door connecting kitchen to dining area, ensuring seamless service.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, featuring large windows to maximize natural light while ensuring Vastu compliance.
Secondary bedroom with ample space and functional design, including built-in storage solutions.
Bathroom fitted with modern fixtures and efficient layout for ease of use and maintenance.
Dedicated home office space designed to support productivity, offering a quiet environment away from the main living area. Located near natural light sources and with a direct view of the courtyard.

openings.description: Modern door design with natural finishes ensuring smooth transition between levels.
Large window providing optimal daylight and a calming view of the central courtyard.
Window ensuring ample natural light, positioned to enhance focus and productivity.
